item.title: JVM signal processing part 1
item.description: Objective Simple demo code for JVM signal processing. Review the setup and configuration for Scala Breeze signal processing. Target Audience JVM Developers new to modern signal processing frameworks and tooling Source Documents Physionet QRS complex First-Derivative Based QRS Detection Algorithm Shannon energy non linear Algorithm Convolution Convolution Filters Scala Breeze Java Colt Project Scala Demo app Summary Use First-Derivative Based QRS Detection Algorithm implemented in Scala Breeze for detecting R-R interval of a ECG signal
